question: Comet Hale-Bopp orbits the sun every 60 years. Chris's grandfather saw the Comet when he was 26 years old. Chris saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his grandfather was when he saw the Comet. How old was Chris when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Chris saw the Comet for the second time when he was 26 years * 3= <<26*3=78>>78 years old.
Comet Hale-Bopp can be seen every 60 years, so Chris saw the comet for the first time when he was 78 years - 60 years = <<78-60=18>>18 years old.
#### 18
